snippet.textDisplay: Beautiful. In my opinion, this is one of the most underrated Zelda games, and it has one of the most underrated soundtracks.
snippet.textOriginal: Beautiful. In my opinion, this is one of the most underrated Zelda games, and it has one of the most underrated soundtracks.

snippet.textDisplay: Agreed, in fact this is actually my favorite game (and favorite game OST) ever. 'Tis a shame that more people don't like it, but it's definitely one of those love-it-or-hate-it games, and I was enthralled from beginning to end.
snippet.textOriginal: Agreed, in fact this is actually my favorite game (and favorite game OST) ever. 'Tis a shame that more people don't like it, but it's definitely one of those love-it-or-hate-it games, and I was enthralled from beginning to end.

snippet.textDisplay:
Attention left-handed people,

I have a way to fix this problem.  Put the Wii remote in your left hand and the nunchuck in your right.

Your welcome
snippet.textOriginal:
Attention left-handed people,

snippet.textDisplay:
I feel like this and the Skyward Sword theme are the best in the game.
It's not necessarily bad by any means, but when compared with past Zelda games, the soundtrack isn't quite as up there as past one.
Gameplay on the other hand...
snippet.textOriginal:
I feel like this and the Skyward Sword theme are the best in the game.
It's not necessarily bad by any means, but when compared with past Zelda games, the soundtrack isn't quite as up there as past one.
Gameplay on the other hand...

snippet.textDisplay:
I won't spoil much of this game for those who played it yet, but I what I can tell you is that it has awesome music. Both its music and game mechanics makes it into an enjoyable Zelda experience, certainly one that is worth paying attention to.

Also, thanks for uploading this calming tune, SupraDarky. :)
Greetings from Norway and Europe!
snippet.textOriginal:
I won't spoil much of this game for those who played it yet, but I what I can tell you is that it has awesome music. Both its music and game mechanics makes it into an enjoyable Zelda experience, certainly one that is worth paying attention to.

Also, thanks for uploading this calming tune, SupraDarky. :)
Greetings from Norway and Europe!

snippet.textDisplay: @SupraDarky My other personal favorites that i've noticed the most aside from the Main Theme are Island in the Sky and the Mini-Boss music which is probably more epic than the regular boss music, and the Lumpy Pumpkin's regular theme. Also, the song that plays when you're flying reminded me of Indiana Jones.
snippet.textOriginal: @SupraDarky My other personal favorites that i've noticed the most aside from the Main Theme are Island in the Sky and the Mini-Boss music which is probably more epic than the regular boss music, and the Lumpy Pumpkin's regular theme. Also, the song that plays when you're flying reminded me of Indiana Jones.

snippet.textDisplay: Well I got the game today and started playing it about an hour ago. The game is still on too, I can see Link standing around in Skyloft if I turn my head to the left. So yeah, I've been on an almost complete media blackout for this game so it's exciting. I went with Skyloft since that's where I'm at and I already really like it (sounds like a mix of Wind Waker and Animal Crossing). I'm sure I'll like a lot more tracks that will end up in this list.
snippet.textOriginal: Well I got the game today and started playing it about an hour ago. The game is still on too, I can see Link standing around in Skyloft if I turn my head to the left. So yeah, I've been on an almost complete media blackout for this game so it's exciting. I went with Skyloft since that's where I'm at and I already really like it (sounds like a mix of Wind Waker and Animal Crossing). I'm sure I'll like a lot more tracks that will end up in this list.
